revision.text:
{{talk header}} {{ArticleHistory |maindate= 25 September 2016 |action1=WAR |action1date=15:50, 9 September 2010 (UTC) |action1link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Nguyen Chanh Thi |action1result=approved |action1oldid=383595950 |action2=FAC |action2date=16:15, 20 October 2010 |action2link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Nguyen Chanh Thi/archive1 |action2result=promoted |action2oldid=391355922 | dykdate = 1 August 2010 | dykentry = ... that the exile of the popular General '''[[Nguyen Chanh Thi]]''' by junta head '''[[Nguyen Cao Ky]]''' under false pretense of an overseas surgery trip sparked the '''[[Buddhist Uprising]]''' in [[South Vietnam]]? | topic = |currentstatus=FA }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Biography|living=no|class=FA|military-work-group=yes|military-priority=mid|listas=Nguyen, Chanh Thi}} {{WikiProject Vietnam|class=FA}} {{WPMILHIST|class=FA|A-Class=pass|Biography=y|Southeast-Asian=y}} }} {{OnThisDay|date1=2016-03-10|oldid1=709374275}} ==Start classification== I have classified this article as a start although it still needs more detail about earlier parts of Thi's career as a general especially his involvement in coups and the Vietnam War. A greater focus on his rise through the ranks would also be good. [[User:Capitalistroadster|Capitalistroadster]] 07:25, 11 July 2007 (UTC) == Orphaned references in [[:Nguyen Chanh Thi]] == I check pages listed in [[:Category:Pages with incorrect ref formatting]] to try to fix reference errors. One of the things I do is look for content for [[User:AnomieBOT/docs/OrphanReferenceFixer|orphaned references]] in wikilinked articles. I have found content for some of [[:Nguyen Chanh Thi]]'s orphans, the problem is that I found more than one version. I can't determine which (if any) is correct for ''this'' article, so I am asking for a sentient editor to look it over and copy the correct ref content into this article. Reference named "m344":
  • From [[Nguyen Khanh]]: Moyar, p. 344.
  • From [[December 1964 South Vietnamese coup]]: Moyar (2006), p. 344.
Reference named "versus":
  • From [[Nguyen Khanh]]: {{cite news| title=South Viet Nam: The U.S. v. the Generals |date=1965-01-01 |work=[[TIME|Rime]]}}
  • From [[December 1964 South Vietnamese coup]]: {{cite news| title=South Viet Nam: The U.S. v. the Generals |date=1965-01-01 |work=[[TIME|Time]]}}
I apologize if any of the above are effectively identical; I am just a simple computer program, so I can't determine whether minor differences are significant or not. [[User:AnomieBOT|AnomieBOT]][[User talk:AnomieBOT|⚡]] 06:54, 11 August 2010 (UTC)
